short_summary: ORION Hardware SSC ORION HARDWARE - BPM018985- Amendment 004
description: Materiel ORION SSC ORION HARDWARE - BPM018985- Amendment 004
full_summary:
===============

### Tender Notice
---------------

**Tender No.** | SSC-23-00022969:T |
**Publication Date** | June 9, 2023 |
**Closing Date** | June 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST |
**Type of Tender** | Request for Proposal (RFP) |
**Procurement Category** | Goods and Services (GD) |

**Summary**
------------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bids for the acquisition of ORION Hardware, as per amendment 004 to the original tender. The procurement is open to all qualified suppliers.

### Tender Details
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number**: BPM018985/22969
* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00022969:T
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **GSIN Code**: *ADP Support Equipment (N7035)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba

### Contracting Entity
---------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 0B6, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Dimeji Temidire
* **Email**: [dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 613-618-2048
* **Fax**: 999-999-9999

### Tender Attachments
---------------------

Please refer to the following links to access the tender attachments:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E62FA1DB-5BE4-4892-94B3-6C89EF76A008
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E69812EC-3587-4A6C-A175-B9349E0E3E9E

### Notice and Instructions
-------------------------

Please carefully review the tender notice and instructions before submitting your bid. All bids must be submitted electronically via the SSC SmartProcurement (SSCP2) platform. The bid closing date is June 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. No bids will be accepted after this deadline. The SSC SSCP2 system will automatically close the tender submission opportunity
